name: Jikan
description: An unofficial MyAnimeList REST API providing access to a comprehensive database of anime and manga, including search, character, and schedule data

about.overview: Jikan API is an open-source, unofficial MyAnimeList REST API that provides developers with easy access to anime and manga data, including details on titles, characters, staff, and schedules, without requiring authentication.
features: Search with advanced filters and pagination
Seasonal and schedule data for anime
useCases: Developing Discord bots for anime communities

endpoints.description: Search for anime with optional query parameters
Retrieve detailed information for a specific anime by ID

quickStart: Make a GET request to https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime
Parse the JSON response to integrate data into your application

authentication.description: No authentication required; access endpoints directly.
